text: aur jaan rakho ki tum mein khuda ke paigambar (maujood) hain bahut see baaten aisee hain ki agar rasool unamen tumhaara kaha maan liya karen to (ulate) tum hee mushkil mein pad jao lekin khuda ne tumhen eemaan kee mohabbat de dee hai aur usako tumhaare dilon mein umada kar dikhaaya hai aur kufr aur badakaaree aur naafaramaanee se tumako bezaar kar diya hai yahee log khuda ke fazal va ehasaan se raahe hidaayat par hain
